text: motor vehicles authority to suspend or revoke license amend rsa i d to read as follows d is incompetent to drive a motor vehicle by reason of physical or mental or moral impairment for purposes of this paragraph a license suspension or revocation on the basis of moral impairment shall be predicated only upon a conviction of a crime involving moral turpitude lba amended hb fiscal note as amended by the house amendment h methodology this bill removes language specific to moral impairment and turpitude when determining an individual as competent to drive the department of safety states this bill will have no impact on state county and local revenue or expenditures agencies contacted department of safety
